languages.text: "Устранение бесполезных артефактов было первым шагом к переоснащению мира. Лишь мои техносоратники внемлили гласу истины, что проник в их {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитаторы{/g} и позволил прорвать полог пустых догматов".

traits.locale_text: "То, что ты называешь ересью — полог неведения, что окутывает каждого раба Империума. Тебе не под силу увидеть то величие, что скрывают пустые догматы, переполняющие твою голову".
traits.speaker: Fabricator

languages.text: "The removal of unserviceable artefacts was the first step toward retooling this world. Only my tech-comrades heeded the call of truth that reached into their {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} and allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."
languages.original_text: "Устранение бесполезных артефактов было первым шагом к переоснащению мира. Лишь мои техносоратники внемлили гласу истины, что проник в их {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитаторы{/g} и позволил прорвать полог пустых догматов".

traits.locale_text: "The removal of unserviceable artifacts was the first step toward the world's refitment. Only my tech-brethren heeded the call of truth that reached out to their cogitators and allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."
traits.speaker: Fabricator

traits.locale_text: "The removal of unserviceable artifacts was the first step toward the world's refitment. Only my tech-brethren heeded the call of truth that reached out to their cogitators and allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."

traits.speaker: Fabricator

traits.locale_text: "The removal of unserviceable artifacts was the first step toward retooling this world. Only my tech-brethren heeded the call of truth reaching out to their {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}, which allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."
traits.speaker: Fabricator

traits.locale_text: "The removal of unserviceable artefacts was the first step toward retooling this world. Only my tech-comrades heeded the call of truth that reached into their {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} and allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."
traits.speaker: Fabricator

traits.locale_text: "The removal of unserviceable artefacts was the first step toward retooling this world. Only my tech-comrades heeded the call of truth that reached into their {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} and allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."
traits.speaker: Fabricator

languages.text: “移除那些已经无法使用的人工造物，是彻底改造这个世界的第一步。我的技术伙伴们听从了真理的召唤，允许真理进入他们的{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}深处，从而看穿了那些空洞无物的教条。”
languages.original_text: "The removal of unserviceable artefacts was the first step toward retooling this world. Only my tech-comrades heeded the call of truth that reached into their {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} and allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."

traits.locale_text: “移除那些已经无法使用的人工造物，是彻底改造这个世界的第一步。我的技术伙伴们听从了真理的召唤，允许真理进入他们的{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}深处，从而看穿了那些空洞无物的教条。”
traits.speaker: Fabricator

languages.text: «La eliminación de elementos inservibles fue el primer paso de la reorientación de este mundo. Solo mis tecnocamaradas escucharon la llamada de la verdad, que entró en sus {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitadores{/g} y les permitió atravesar el velo de los dogmas vacuos».
languages.original_text: "The removal of unserviceable artefacts was the first step toward retooling this world. Only my tech-comrades heeded the call of truth that reached into their {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} and allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."

traits.locale_text: «La eliminación de elementos inservibles fue el primer paso de la reorientación de este mundo. Solo mis tecnocamaradas escucharon la llamada de la verdad, que entró en sus {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitadores{/g} y les permitió atravesar el velo de los dogmas vacuos».
traits.speaker: Fabricator

languages.text: 「役に立たないアーチファクトの排除は、この世界を再構築するための第一歩だ。我が技術同胞だけが、彼らの{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}に届く真実の呼びかけに耳を傾け、空虚な教義のベールを突き破ることができる」
languages.original_text: "The removal of unserviceable artefacts was the first step toward retooling this world. Only my tech-comrades heeded the call of truth that reached into their {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} and allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."

traits.locale_text: 「役に立たないアーチファクトの排除は、この世界を再構築するための第一歩だ。我が技術同胞だけが、彼らの{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}に届く真実の呼びかけに耳を傾け、空虚な教義のベールを突き破ることができる」
traits.speaker: Fabricator

languages.text: "Die Entfernung nicht dienlicher Artefakte war der erste Schritt bei der Umfunktionierung dieser Welt. Nur meine Tech-Kameraden sind dem Ruf der Wahrheit gefolgt, der ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitatoren{/g} erreichte und ihnen ermöglichte, den Schleier leerer Dogmen zu durchdringen."
languages.original_text: "The removal of unserviceable artefacts was the first step toward retooling this world. Only my tech-comrades heeded the call of truth that reached into their {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} and allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."

traits.locale_text: "Die Entfernung nicht dienlicher Artefakte war der erste Schritt bei der Umfunktionierung dieser Welt. Nur meine Tech-Kameraden sind dem Ruf der Wahrheit gefolgt, der ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitatoren{/g} erreichte und ihnen ermöglichte, den Schleier leerer Dogmen zu durchdringen."
traits.speaker: Fabricator

languages.text: « Débarrasser ce monde de ses artefacts irréparables n'était que la première étape de sa transformation. Seuls mes technoconfrères ont entendu l'appel de la Vérité qui s'est insinué dans leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateurs{/g} et leur a permis de percer le voile des dogmes stériles. »
languages.original_text: "The removal of unserviceable artefacts was the first step toward retooling this world. Only my tech-comrades heeded the call of truth that reached into their {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} and allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."

traits.locale_text: « Débarrasser ce monde de ses artefacts irréparables n'était que la première étape de sa transformation. Seuls mes technoconfrères ont entendu l'appel de la Vérité qui s'est insinué dans leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateurs{/g} et leur a permis de percer le voile des dogmes stériles. »
traits.speaker: Fabricator

languages.text: "Hizmete layık olmayan kalıntılardan kurtulmak, bu dünyanın değişimine yönelik ilk adımdı. Yalnızca tekno yoldaşlarım, {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarlarına{/g} ulaşıp boş dogmalar yumağından kurtulmalarını sağlayan hakikatin çağrısına kulak verdi."
languages.original_text: "The removal of unserviceable artefacts was the first step toward retooling this world. Only my tech-comrades heeded the call of truth that reached into their {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} and allowed them to pierce the veil of empty dogmas."

traits.locale_text: "Hizmete layık olmayan kalıntılardan kurtulmak, bu dünyayı yeniden düzenlemeye yönelik ilk adımdı. Yalnızca tekno yoldaşlarım {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarlar{/g}ına ulaşıp boş dogmalar yumağından kurtulmalarını sağlayan hakikatin çağrısına kulak verdi."
traits.speaker: Fabricator
